channel.title: Question
channel.description:
Is it normal to feel lost on the server? And feel afraid to touch (gather resources) for fear of "griefing"
lol what I'm saying is I feel very lost and out of place, I'm currently by a big stone connection of walkways and stairs and don't know what to do x)

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

If you fear your greifing look around for a structure or some type of object to show its someones property.
Just travel about 500 blocks away from the spawn and you’ll be right.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Just walk a bit away from spawn, it is pretty crowded close to the base.

Read full topic
